text: Kim Zolciak - Biermann and her family have been through quite a lot the last few months. Back in April, Kash Biermann was bitten by a dog, and now the Don't Be Tardy mom has confirmed that Kash just had surgery, as did her daughter, Brielle Biermann. She shared the news on Instagram. ` ` [ Two ] kids same recovery room! It's all good though [, ] had the best doctor! Had to take a pic for @ kashbiermann and @ briellebiermann for memory sake. Tonsils and adenoids removed!'' The Real Housewives of Atlanta mama said. ` ` Onward and Upwards.'' The Daily Dish reached out for more
